title: Way Over-rated.
review: This is one of those movies that you either love or hate. I didn't enjoy it. Lots of boring repetition. I got in to the 'spookyness' of it a little, but not much. The 'F' word usually doesn't bother me much, but when it's used as every other word in the script it gets 'trashy' real fast. I love movies and am usually easily entertained. This one didn't do it.

title: Sucks with Gusto, Big Time!
review: Worst movie I've seen in the last 2 years. I've always said I've never seen Tom Cruise in a bad movie... that is until this one. Gross, Boring, No plot, Repulsive, Depressing. Great actors that couldn't seem to get it together and conversations that seemed to last forever. I started to walk out after the first 30 minutes. At the end of the movie, I wish I had.
